dialogue.name: Aggravated boy
dialogue.text: Yeah, just give me a moment T, jeez. I'm...looking for anything I can use as a weapon, y'now in case there's anything dangerous...

dialogue.name: T
dialogue.text: But you've been just staring at the cave door for a few minutes now. I only came because you made me so if you're not going in I'm going home

dialogue.name: Player
dialogue.text: FINE! Let me unlock the door

dialogue.name: Player
dialogue.text: ARRGGHH, THE KEY! I think I dropped it

dialogue.name: T
dialogue.text: You think maybe you dropped it when were messing aroung those fallen trees earlier?

dialogue.name: Player
dialogue.text: Yeah you're right. Probably happened when you PUSHED ME off of it!
